section.title: countries master list of Countries
section.para: A comprehensive list of Country definitions is provided with the system for use in Address and Currency masters. To access the master list of Country definitions, select the "Countries" option. The following screen will appear:

tip.para: While Country definitions may be added or edited, you should carefully consider before making any changes to the existing definitions. In general, changing Country definitions should be discouraged.

section.para: The "Countries" screen displays information on all existing Countries, including Country abbreviation, Country name, Country Currency abbreviation, Country Currency name, and Country Currency symbol.
To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Country definition.

Enables you to edit highlighted Country definitions. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Country definition—except that when editing, the fields will contain Country information. Double-clicking on a Country definition will also bring you to the editing screen.
Highlight a Country definition and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight a Country definition and then select this button to remove the Country from the list.
